mapper.select: SELECT * FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO > 0 AND ACTIVE='Y'
mapper.insert: insert into notice (notice_no, admin_id, title, content, active, regdate, updatedate) values(seq_admin_notice_no.nextval, #{admin_id}, #{title}, #{content}, 'Y', sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.update: update notice set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, active = #{active}, updatedate = sysdate where notice_no = #{notice_no}
